scripts.build:all: concurrently "cd forgy_backend_api && npm run build" "cd forgy_mobile_app && npm run build" "cd forgy_admin_web && npm run build"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd forgy_backend_api && npm install" "cd forgy_mobile_app && npm install" "cd forgy_admin_web && npm install"
scripts.db:init: cd forgy_backend_api && docker compose up -d --build && node -e "setTimeout(() => console.log('DB Lista'), 5000)" && docker exec -it forgy-backend npx prisma migrate deploy && docker exec -it forgy-backend npx prisma generate
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/node_modules forgy_backend_api/package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/dist forgy_mobile_app/node_modules forgy_mobile_app/package-lock.json
